Title: Droid Builder
Description:
Droid Builder is a WPF based application that can help Android ROM maker to create customized ROM.
The basic functions of Droid Build are:
1. Deodex
2. Packaging
3. Signing
In future, Droid Builder will provide more function on Android ROM customization.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Droid Builder is a WPF based application that helps Android ROM makers to create ROM with GUI. Droid Builder is original designed for HTC Droid Incredible to port MIUI, but should work for any android devices.

Features

  • Deodex
  • Patch
  • Build

Issues?

Please submit an issue report to Issue Tracker. Usually, any exception will be logged in error.log in the application directory. Submit an issue with log/steps will help me to quickly identify the issue and fix it.
The error.log will not collect your personal information.

Incredible ROM

The Incredible ROM is mainly for Chinese users. 点此进入ROM专版
